document_data.name: Harvest Inn
document_data.mainbody: The '''Harvest Inn''' was an inn located in [[Westbridge]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Atmosphere: The inn was the favorite gathering spot for travelers on the [[Long Road]], which ran between the northern cities of [[Waterdeep]] and [[Mirabar]].
document_data.Structure: The Harvest Inn contained comfortable beds at reasonable prices and it included [[Derry's Tavern and Eatery]], a famous bar wherein travelers exchanged tales every night.
document_data.Staff: The inn's proprietor in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]] was the affable [[halfling]] [[Herivin Dardragon]], a collector and purveyor of unusual and sometimes distasteful works of art with questionable artistic value.<ref>
